short_summary: Manufacture of two types of trawl nets
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on September 27th, 2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Fisheries and Oceans Canada is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the manufacture of two types of trawl nets, namely a net to equip the trawl when it is fitted with an internal protective grill, and another for when the grill will not be used, as detailed in Section 7.

full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Commercial Fishing Nets
#### Contract Information

| **Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| **Contract Reference** | WS3592684893 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS3592684893 |
| **Publication Date** | September 7, 2022 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | September 27, 2022, at 2:00 PM EDT |
| **Contract Status** | Expired |

#### Contract Description

Fisheries and Oceans Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the manufacture of two types of trawl nets. The first type is designed to be used with an internal protective grill, and the second type is designed to be used when the grill is not installed. The RFP is available on Ariba Discovery.

#### Contact Information

| **Name** | Melanie Parent (SPAC/PSPC) |
| **Email** | [melanie.parent@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.parent@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) |
| **Phone** | (None) |
| **Fax** | (None) |
